last_episode_to_air.name: House of Heroes
last_episode_to_air.overview: Harriet sacrifices herself as Eddie and KT finally unlock the portal to destroy Ammut and save them all. KT says an emotional goodbye to Frobisher. Joy and Jerome have Mara's blessing, and Alfie has a special gift for Willow.

name: House of Anubis
overview: Strange things are happening at an English boarding school called House of Anubis. Popular student Joy goes missing, the school's cranky caretaker has a creepy stuffed crow and the school's attic may be haunted. When recent American transplant Nina gets thrust into the school during this time, she decides to investigate along with her new friend, Fabian, and housemates.

episodes.name: House of Secrets / House of Attitude / House of the Black Bird / House of Dares / House of Lies
episodes.overview: New student Nina, arrives from America at Anubis House – a spooky old boarding house at the school that is to be her home for the next few years.

episodes.name: House of Locks / House of Eyes
episodes.overview: Whilst hiding from Victor, Nina accidentally opens a secret panel in the attic with her pendant and sees a pair of eyes looking out at her! Patricia persuades Mara to help her steal Joy’s file from Mr Sweet’s office, instigating a bag search by Victor.

episodes.name: House of Agendas / House of Keys
episodes.overview: Patricia reports Joy as a missing person to the police. After looking up the hieroglyphic symbols from the back of the old painting, Fabian and Nina manage to crack the code leading them to the staircase where they find the next clue."

episodes.name: House of Discovery / House of Hyper
episodes.overview: Nina and Fabian sneak up to the attic and find some strange wax cylinders. They take the wax cylinders to Fabian’s uncle who runs an antique shop and find out they are phonograph cylinders.

episodes.name: House of Cheats / House of Rumors
episodes.overview: Nina and Fabian sneak back into the attic to listen to the cylinders but it makes a loud screeching sound and they have to abandon their plans. Patricia sees someone hanging around on the school grounds and is freaked out, thinking it’s a ghost.

episodes.name: House of Intruders / House of Proof
episodes.overview: Mick finds out Mara cheated for him and falls out with her. Amber discovers a secret message written behind the wallpaper. Amber and Nina go to the old people’s home to visit Sarah and confirm that she is the girl from the recordings.

episodes.name: House of Confrontation / House of Alarms
episodes.overview: Patricia meets her “ghost” again in the woods, but this time they talk and he tells her he is actually a private investigator and he’ll help her find Joy.

episodes.name: House of Flames / House of Passages
episodes.overview: Patricia spots Nina’s necklace and recognizes it as the Eye of Horus. The gang opens the next puzzle piece to reveal the second riddle. The teachers confiscate Patricia’s phone and find out she’s been in contact with Rufus Zeno.

episodes.name: House of Kidnap / House of Cat-Nap
episodes.overview: The gang lets Patricia in on the secret, and debates the possibility that Victor might be drinking an elixir of life.

episodes.name: House of Cameras / House of Numbers
episodes.overview: With Trudy gone, Victor installs security cameras to spy on the kids.

episodes.name: House of Scares / House of Fakers
episodes.overview: The security cameras are removed and Trudy returns to the house. The gang goes back down to the cellar to find proof of the elixir, and comes face to face with something terrifying…

episodes.name: House of Identity / House of Emergency
episodes.overview: Alfie gets trapped in the cellar whilst going back to retrieve his zombie mask. Jerome enlists Fabian’s help to rescue a shaken and traumatized Alfie from the cellar.

episodes.name: House of Reunion / House of Memories
episodes.overview: Nina is trying to distance herself from the gang but still can’t help solving the latest riddle leading them to an old dictionary which can only be opened with her locket. Patricia rescues Rufus from the hospital and hides him in the woods.

episodes.name: House of Drama / House of Codes
episodes.overview: The gang works out they could be searching for the Cup of Ankh and plot to steal the puzzle piece from Victor’s safe. Then, during the school play, Patricia spots Joy…

episodes.name: House of Risk / House of Thieves
episodes.overview: Patricia plans to meet with Joy, but plans go awry.

episodes.name: House of Hazard / House of Charades
episodes.overview: Having kidnapped Patricia, Rufus attempts to blackmail Mr. Sweet and the Society.

episodes.name: House of Rendezvous / House of Rescue
episodes.overview: Fabian manages to track Nina and Amber to the warehouse and rescue them. The gang manages to rescue Patricia but Rufus drives off and escapes. They give Mrs Andrews an ultimatum to give them some answers within the next twenty four hours.

episodes.name: House of Arrest / House of Hoax
episodes.overview: The toxicology report arrives from the hospital – Nina and Fabian sneak into Victor’s office to read it. Fabian confides to Nina that he lost one of the puzzle pieces, luckily Patricia finds out that Alfie has it and manages to rescue it.

episodes.name: House of Time / House of Aliens
episodes.overview: The latest riddle leads them to the grandfather clock, but when they open it it’s empty. Alfie is still fishing around so the gang tells him he was right all along about aliens.

episodes.name: House of Masks / House of Pursuit
episodes.overview: The gang decide to return to the cellar to collect a sample of the elixir, with Alfie insisting that he should go alone to prove himself. Victor is suspicious when he discovers the gang were helped in their school play research by a woman called Sarah.

episodes.name: House of Yesterday / House of Victory
episodes.overview: Victor arranges for Sarah to visit the house where we find out about their childhood together.

episodes.name: House of Bribes / House of Venom
episodes.overview: Mara is furious that Mick cheated for her in the school elections. Nina attends Sarah’s funeral then witnesses a confrontation between Rufus and Victor at the care home. Victor tries to find out how much Nina knows, but she is giving nothing away.

episodes.name: House of the Stars / House of Harsh
episodes.overview: It’s Nina’s unlucky day when Victor padlocks the attic door to stop her going up there again. Now she can’t get to the puzzle pieces! The Sibunas plan to go down into the cellar, to collect some of the elixir and try to crack the latest clue.

episodes.name: House of Lights / House of Allegiance
episodes.overview: Jerome poses as Alfie’s savior after his failed cellar mission. He demands that Alfie repays him by secretly passing him information on the Sibuna Club. Alfie and Jerome fall out when Jerome accidentally reveals that he is working for Rufus.

episodes.name: House of Pests / House of Betrayal
episodes.overview: Victor plants an “infestation” of mice in the house as an excuse to keep the children away overnight.

episodes.name: House of Revelation / House of Heavy
episodes.overview: Jerome gives Rufus Alfie’s puzzle piece much to the dismay of Alfie. Nina hatches a plan to bring Rufus to Anubis House and trick him into bringing the missing puzzle piece.

episodes.name: House of Hush / House of Spies / House of Sting / House of Never / House of Forever
episodes.overview: Joy fails in her attempts to assemble the Cup of Ankh. Could Nina be the Chosen One instead? The Sibunas face their toughest challenge as Rufus makes his final play for immortality at any cost.

episodes.name: House of Hello / House of Dolls
episodes.overview: The Sibuna gang return and have a midnight feast in the attic where they find a dollhouse. Victor searches for The Book of Isis – an ancient tome that will tell him how to recreate the Elixir. Nina looks for a new hiding place for the cup, but is it safe?

episodes.name: House of Spirits / House of Blackmail
episodes.overview: Jerome is blackmailed by a 7th grader. Nina has a dream, inspired by a riddle. Alfie saves the dollhouse, the gang finds out who is blackmailing Jerome, Senkhara tells Nina to find the Mask of Anubis, and Victor is thinks he will find The Book of Isis.

episodes.name: House of Rivals / House of Faces
episodes.overview: Mara is upset that Mick’s family is moving, Alfie tries to impress Amber, and Fabian writes a poem for Nina. There’s a replica of the Mask of Anubis in the Exhibition, so Nina and Fabian go check it out.

episodes.name: House of Myths / House of Nightmares
episodes.overview: Senkhara leaves her mark on Nina, and Fabian’s godfather, Jasper, advises her about the mark and the Mask. Nina thinks the Mask is in the house – and then the dollhouse opens to reveal a map. Poppy researches her and Jerome’s father.

episodes.name: House of Combinations / House of Heartbreak
episodes.overview: Fabian keeps the Jackal mark a secret, while Nina’s map leads them to a secret door in the cellar, but she needs the right code to get in. Amber saves Nina and Fabian from Victor, and insists they tell her what’s going on.

episodes.name: House of Tunnels / House of Goodbye
episodes.overview: Amber joins the Sibunas as they find the antechamber and amulets. Mara’s upset about Mick. Trudy’s leaving to work in the Exhibition and Mick is leaving for good. Meanwhile, Jerome decides to hire a Private Investigator.

episodes.name: House of Protection / House of Letters
episodes.overview: Amber’s temporarily blinded by a strange beacon booby trap. Nina and Fabian discover the only thing that can protect them. Nina and Fabian explore the first Task in the tunnels, set by Sarah’s father Robert.

episodes.name: House of Who? / House of Frauds
episodes.overview: New boy Eddie arrives and makes an enemy in Patricia. Amber surprises Nina by finding something Nina’s been looking for. Eddie causes trouble at Jerome’s fundraiser day, and things get worse when Mara figures out it’s all a scam.

episodes.name: House of Chance / House of Divides
episodes.overview: Nina and Fabian puzzle over the mysterious cube that they found in the tunnels. Nina figures out how to make the mysterious cube into a key to unlock the first door in the tunnels, and soon the Sibunas face their next Task.

episodes.name: House of Crushes / House of Vertigo
episodes.overview: The Sibunas’ next Task is a deadly Egyptian version of hopscotch. If they get the sequences wrong then the ceiling starts to descend. The gang figures out the safe sequence to cross the deadly hopscotch. Then, when Nina hears Senkhara, she follows.

episodes.name: House of Pressure / House of Deja Vu
episodes.overview: The day of the Ball. Amber, Nina and Fabian have had the same dream of the Spirit pushing Nina into the Chasm. The night of the Ball. Amber, Nina and Fabian complete the hopscotch challenge but there’s a bigger test to come.

episodes.name: House of Hoods / House of Deceit
episodes.overview: The Collector creeps into the Library. Jerome and Alfie bet Eddie that he can’t get Patricia to dance, and Eddie wins. Nina flees to the tunnels, while Jerome reads the letter his Dad sent to Poppy. Nina is angry with Fabian.

episodes.name: House of Sibuna / House of Payback
episodes.overview: Jerome's dad wants him to visit him in prison. Patricia finds out about Eddie's bet, and Joy & Mara sign up for the school website. The Sibunas practice laying the beam, and Victor finds the lock in the cellar and map of the tunnels, which he copies.

episodes.name: House of Pendulums / House of Impasse
episodes.overview: Victor & Vera hide in the cellar & see Nina entering the code. Patricia’s revenge backfires, and the Sibunas enter the antechamber. Victor is blinded by the beacon flash. Poppy's Father wants a prison visit. The Sibunas cross the chasm.

episodes.name: House of Help / House of Phobias
episodes.overview: Victor’s sight returns & he finds a passage. Jerome goes to visit his Dad, but Poppy has beaten him! The Sibunas find a crawl tunnel. Fabian saves Alfie from the tunnel. Amber & Alfie break up. Victor spots the amulet & takes all pupils’ jewelry.

episodes.name: House of Barriers / House of Curfews
episodes.overview: Victor explores the tunnels, the Sibunas plot to get the amulets. Jerome’s father has a mission. Vera finds the Book of Isis. The Sibunas plot to keep Victor awake. Jerome begins his quest & Fabian tries to tell Nina he wants to get back together.

episodes.name: House of Dead-Ends / House of Webs
episodes.overview: Jerome tells Mara about his dad’s mission. Now the Sibunas have the amulets back, they set out to defeat the tunnel of terror. Nina opens the nextTask tunnel. Meanwhile Jerome embarks on a wild goose chase and Vera meanwhile finds a spare amulet.

episodes.name: House of Fronts / House of Keepers
episodes.overview: Amber gives Fabian advice about Joy. Alfie’s goose eats Jerome’s dad’s gem. Trudy realizes that Vera is not all she seems. Trudy shares her suspicions with Mrs Andrews. Victor and Vera succeed in swapping the spare amulet. Patricia’s amulet falls off.

episodes.name: House of Hacks / House of Stings
episodes.overview: Mara investigates a ‘profile’ on the website.The goose passes the gem, but Mara drops it. Patricia wears the fake amulet. As the Sibunas explore the spider’s web task, Patricia arrives to warn them. Mr Sweet tells Mara about Vera's job.

episodes.name: House of Double-Cross / House of Wires
episodes.overview: Jerome has Patricia’s amulet. Nina & Fabian have to get the gem and do a trade for the amulet. Nina sees a riddle. Jerome has the gem, but has a problem. Mara finds the missing chapter of the Book of Isis. The Sibunas find a clue to the Spider task.

episodes.name: House of Envy / House of Names
episodes.overview: Victor is translating The Book of Isis. Fabian takes Joy out. Nina decides to the Web chamber. Eddie & Patricia misbehave in class. Jerome wants the shield, so he’ll have to win it back. Mara finds out Vera’s résumé is a lie & Nina learns Senkhara’s name.

episodes.name: House of Evidence / House of Genius
episodes.overview: The Sibunas complete the web task. Nina figures out she's responsible for unleashing Senkhara. Victor can solve the latest task. Jerome needs help to win back the Shield. Victor is seen with chemicals. Mara might oust Vera on the school website.

episodes.name: House of Slander / House of Hasty
episodes.overview: Alfie is ping pong coach and Vera’s upset with the article. Eddie plans a prank on Mr Sweet. Victor completes the task. Senkhara is furious. Mara & Vera have a hearing about Mara’s claims. Fabian thinks he's solved the task, Eddie’s Mr Sweet backfires.

episodes.name: House of Sorry / House of Hex
episodes.overview: Mara is expelled. Jerome fires Alfie. Vera bribes her witness. Mrs Andrews resigns to save Mara. Patricia learns a secret & Nina gets bad news. Jerome’s tournament goes badly. Nina’s words are twisted by Senkhara. Nina has a vision of what may happen.

episodes.name: House of Silence / House of Warnings
episodes.overview: Jerome’s opponents used crooked balls. Victor explores the next Task. Nina realizes her words have hexed her friends. Victor has his own amulet. Eddie tries to speak to Patricia. Alfie plays on the horns. The klaxon sounds again, the ceiling cracks.

episodes.name: House of Status / House of Laments
episodes.overview: The Dollhouse tells the Sibunas the tune for the task. Amber agrees to be in a commercial. Mara tries to make Mick jealous. Alfie’s curse accelerates. Patricia stands Eddie up, Nina finds some of the lyrics, Victor and Vera hatch a plan.

episodes.name: House of Heists / House of Alibis
episodes.overview: Vera steals the Ox Bell from the exhibition. Jerome’s has to babysit Alfie, and Nina makes a discovery in her bedroom. Fabian is unable to give Trudy an alibi. Eddie is shocked when Patricia tells him she never kissed anyone. Alfie turns into a baby.

episodes.name: House of Oblivion / House of Snoops
episodes.overview: Fabian can't remember his name. Vera plants the bell in his room, the Sibunas complete the task. Nina and friends walk into a trap. Victor and Vera’s plan backfires. Patricia admits she's been keeping a secret.Trudy gets closer to the truth about Vera.

episodes.name: House of Reflections / House of Stooges
episodes.overview: A riddle hints that it is the final chamber before the Mask. Eddie decides to kiss Patricia, and Trudy is missing. Victor has the first of the reflectors. Jasper obsesses over the Gem. Mr Sweet asks Eddie & Patricia to dinner.

episodes.name: House of Zodiacs / House of Reckoning
episodes.overview: The race is on to find the reflectors. Mr Sweet doesn’t believe the gem has been stolen. Piper turns up posing as Patricia. Victor has his own copy of the Zodiac. Amber makes a copy. Fabian can’t decipher the symbols. Jerome hacks Jasper’s computer.

episodes.name: House of Trades / House of Magic
episodes.overview: Patricia feels Piper is cramping her style. Trudy is kidnapped. The Sibunas discover a door, but need Victor’s amulet back to open it. Alfie & Piper get closer. Jerome’s search leads him to Sarah’s dollhouse. Alfie’s magic show leaves everyone reeling.

episodes.name: House of Tricks / House of Whispers
episodes.overview: Victor’s amulet's in one piece. Eddie reveals kissed Piper. Nina & Fabian realize Vera is after the mask. Eddie & Mara do a story on the website. Alfie has tricked Victor & Vera. Jerome and Jasper are plotting. Patricia reveals Eddie’s true identity.

episodes.name: House of Duplicity / House of Hauntings
episodes.overview: The race is on to find the missing falcon reflectors. Jasper is confronted about his talks with Jerome. Eddie’s reveals a video image of Senkhara. Eddie & Mara start a ghost hunt. Sarah’s doll is a falcon reflector, just as Jerome steals it for Jasper.

episodes.name: House of Collections / House of Speculation
episodes.overview: Jasper’s offering is rejected. Jerome must steal the dollhouse, while Eddie & Mara record it all. The Sibunas find their third reflector. Eddie & Mara get a picture of their "ghost." Mara’s theory of their ghost, their story could destroy the mission!

episodes.name: House of Sabotage / House of Nine Lives
episodes.overview: Alfie fails to corrupt Eddie’s pictures. Fabian must persuade Joy not to run the story. Alfie & Amber steal Eddie’s camera. Joy agrees to drop the article. Amber and Alfie confront Jerome and finally learn the awful truth… Rufus is back!

episodes.name: House of Forgeries / House of Hijack
episodes.overview: The Sibunas confront Jasper & persuade him to meet The Collector & offer him a counterfeit mask while the Sibunas rescue Trudy. The Sibunas are locked in the barn, & Alfie tries to rescue them. Senkhara vows to hamper Victor’s progress in his quest.

episodes.name: House of Freeze / House of Timeout
episodes.overview: An article about Nina is on the website. Mara knows "Jack Jackal" didn’t write it. Victor rushes to return his reflectors. Vera bears the mark of Anubis & the Sibunas have the reflectors, but they run out of time. Fabian makes a horrific discovery.

episodes.name: House of Reflectors / House of Illusion
episodes.overview: The Sibunas know Joy wrote the article. Patricia has a solution to fix both her love life & the gang’s problems. The Sibunas enter the final chamber. Eddie & Jerome persuade Mr Sweet about a blogging competition. Rufus’ Ceremony of the Mask is a fake.

episodes.name: House of Dreams / House of Pitfalls
episodes.overview: The Sibunas must play the game of Senet. Joy's still getting a hard time because of Mara. Trudy's having strange dreams. Victor & Vera practice Senet, while the Sibunas consult Jasper. Jerome makes his move on Mara. The floor gives way beneath Nina.

episodes.name: House of Phantoms / House of Surrender
episodes.overview: The Sibunas are reeling at Nina’s disappearance and must cover for her. Nina wakes to find herself in an underground cell. Fabian goes to tell Mr Sweet everything, but discovers that Nina is alive. Fabian makes a wrong move and things look even worse.

episodes.name: House of Strategy / House of Memory
episodes.overview: Joy didn’t submit Mara’s article. The gang is shaken after Alfie’s near miss. Trudy calls a doctor about her memory. Alfie and Amber spy on Trudy and are shocked at what they hear. Fabian hatches a plan.

episodes.name: House of Pretenders / House of Trouble
episodes.overview: Does Mara have feelings for Jerome? Vera follows the doctor’s instructions, and the Sibunas play along. Jerome's in trouble when he runs into Rufus sneaking around. Victor is horrified at losing Alfie on the Senet board. Senkhara hunts for the Osirian.

episodes.name: House of Traps / House of Stakes
episodes.overview: Mara wins blogger of the year, but is too concerned about Jerome. Disaster strikes the gang when Fabian and Joy disagree. Fabian needs to trust Joy. Victor starts to wonder if the kids were right about Vera, and makes a shocking discovery in her room.

episodes.name: House of Missions / House of Captives
episodes.overview: Victor confronts Vera & Patricia tells the Sibunas that Rufus has taken Jerome. Fabian, Patricia & Alfie go to rescue him. Eddie gets into trouble. Fabian, Patricia & Alfie find out why Rufus wants the Mask. Nina unlocks the Mask & learns the truth.

episodes.name: House of the Chosen / House of Freedom
episodes.overview: Frobisher Smythe’s trick is revealed. Mara & Poppy wish Jerome hadn’t disappeared. Eddie acts weird. Senkhara is close to getting what she's wanted, & Nina will pay the price. Will the Sibunas save the day? Will the curse be lifted?

episodes.name: House of Arrivals
episodes.overview: A new girl named KT begins school, and Eddie recalls seeing her in a vision.

episodes.name: House of Presents
episodes.overview: Victor's furious when a parcel goes missing. He doesn't realise it's ended up in Amber's pile of birthday presents. Eddie demands that KT come clean about why she's really here.

episodes.name: House of Truth
episodes.overview: Eddie and KT join forces to unlock the mystery of her key. Amber learns details about her bracelet from Alfie. Victor scrambles to find his lost bracelet. Eddie and KT realize Miss Denby also has a key.

episodes.name: House of Hieroglyphs
episodes.overview: Victor's under pressure to find his missing bracelet. Eddie and KT discover that Miss Denby has a key just like KT's - is there more to their new teacher than they first thought?

episodes.name: House of Revelations
episodes.overview: Amber is accepted to a fashion school in America. Fabian deciphers the bracelet's packaging. Eddie and KT seek info about Miss Denby. Jerome and Mara prepare for the business-studies competition.

episodes.name: House of Questions
episodes.overview: Eddie and KT investigate Miss Denby, Patricia and Fabian suspect KT of working for Victor and Jerome and Mara take the business studies competition seriously and personally.

episodes.name: House of Pi
episodes.overview: Victor steals Amber's bracelet and locks her in the tank room. Eddie and KT find more out about Miss Denby. After Amber is found, she demands that Sibuna be reformed.

episodes.name: House of Mistrust
episodes.overview: KT and Eddie's suspicions about Miss Denby are confirmed, Jerome's sabotage of Mara's project backfires and Amber learns the adults are planning a mysterious ceremony.

episodes.name: House of Trickery
episodes.overview: Amber is found in the tank room; a photo of the real Miss Denby is uncovered; Amber shares what she heard the adults discussing; Victor believes he has his bracelet back.

episodes.name: House of Unity
episodes.overview: Amber leaves, revealing what she heard in the Tank room and demanding that Sibuna is reformed – they have to stop the adults! Meanwhile Victor is delighted he finally has his bracelet – little knowing it's a fake!

episodes.name: House of Entrapment
episodes.overview: The Sibunas discover the man in the tank is Robert Frobisher Smythe – what exactly are the adults plotting? Eddie resolves to reveal Denby's true identity. Meanwhile, Jerome tries to win Mara back.

episodes.name: House of Sisters
episodes.overview: The Sibunas find the real Miss Denby, who has some revelations for them… but will they get away without being caught? Jerome sets his sights on Willow. Joy boosts her confidence with a brand new look.

episodes.name: House of Tombs
episodes.overview: The Sibunas uncover the details of the secret ceremony in a very special place. They rush to rescue Harriet Denby, but discover she's gone. Jerome's love life is in a tangle.

episodes.name: House of Smuggling
episodes.overview: The Sibunas learn that they must perform the ceremony themselves. With news of a school open day, it's the perfect opportunity to sneak out the tank….or is it? Meanwhile, Jerome's double life catches up with him.

episodes.name: House of Anticipation
episodes.overview: The Sibunas make it to the Crypt with the tank and begin their ceremony – but Denby's discovered Frobisher has gone. Can Sibuna complete the ceremony before the adults find them? Meanwhile, Joy grants Willow a very special wish.

episodes.name: House of Close Calls
episodes.overview: The Sibunas fail to wake Frobisher and are trapped in the crypt with the adults on the warpath. Patricia hatched a rescue plan, but will she manage to rescue her friends? Jerome sweats as roommates Mara and Willow get closer…

episodes.name: House of Hustle
episodes.overview: Victor confiscates KT's key and when Jerome begs Patricia for a favour she strikes a deal – if he gets their key back from Victor! The Sibunas discover that the adults have special plans for the eclipse… how will they stop them?

episodes.name: House of Set-Up
episodes.overview: Mr Sweet steals the ceremonial bracelet from Eddie and a shock revelation about the descended leaves Sibuna stunned. Jerome worries that Mara and Willow working together will threaten his secret.

episodes.name: House of History
episodes.overview: The Sibunas learn the history behind the man in the tank and realise they have to stop the ceremony at all costs! Jerome's list of Mara and Willow's pros and cons ends up in Joy's hands – but what will she do with it?

episodes.name: House of Eclipse
episodes.overview: As the eclipse approaches, will Eddie, KT and Fabian get to their friends in time to stop the ceremony? Jerome has a near miss when Joy sends Mara and Willow an incriminating email revealing his secret.

episodes.name: House of Awakening
episodes.overview: Frobisher finally wakes up and as the Sibunas predicted, he's evil. Joy tells Willow & Mara about Jerome's two timing ways. Victor and Denby force Mr Sweet to take drastic action against the Sibunas.

episodes.name: House of Sarcophagi
episodes.overview: Eddie has a bad feeling something terrible is about to happen. The Sibunas plant secret cameras in the gatehouse and hear a strange voice calling for help. Mara and Willow plot revenge on cheating Jerome.

episodes.name: House of Possession
episodes.overview: Jerome, Joy, Patricia and Alfie start acting very strangely, as if guided by an unseen force. Jerome is tricked into believing he's been picked for a talent contest. KT wants answers and foolishly goes to the Gatehouse alone.

episodes.name: House of Greed
episodes.overview: The Sibunas find Frobisher apparently dead – were they wrong all along? Jerome is humiliated in front of the class during the "singing competition". Victor visits the Gatehouse and is captured by Frobisher as his first sinner.

episodes.name: House of Deceptions
episodes.overview: The adults are on the Sibunas' tail, looking for their second sinner. Patricia plans to tell Eddie how she really feels about him, little knowing that Victor and Denby have trapped him in the crypt.

episodes.name: House of Rainbows
episodes.overview: Joy agrees to Mara's ultimate revenge plot – to break Jerome's heart. Meanwhile Mara discovers she is 2nd in line to inherit a Lord's estate. Eddie escapes the crypt and the Sibunas puzzle over how to unlock a mysterious capsule.

episodes.name: House of Enemies
episodes.overview: The Sibunas puzzle over a riddle which leads them to a secret room. Mara is disappointed to learn she has inherited a dog. Denby drives a wedge between Eddie and Patricia in her quest for Frobisher's next sinner.

episodes.name: House of Surprise
episodes.overview: Victor discovers the secret room and installs one of Frobisher's fatal booby traps. Miss Denby continues to meddle in Eddie and Patricia's fragile relationship. Joy's persistence finally pays off when Jerome asks her on a date.

episodes.name: House of Winning
episodes.overview: Anubis House battle Isis House in a Dodgeball Tournament. Harriet Denby escapes from the gatehouse and KT discovers that there's an easier way into the secret room.

episodes.name: House of Moonlighting
episodes.overview: Joy and Jerome share a romantic moment during a very strange date. The Sibunas discover a phonograph in the secret room and it's the final straw for Patricia when she finds intimate messages on Eddie's laptop.

episodes.name: House of Treachery
episodes.overview: Eddie realizes there's a traitor amongst the Sibunas when the phonograph is destroyed, but who is it? Frobisher demands a new sinner for Ammut's collection and Mara has a new plan to shame Jerome.

episodes.name: House of Imposters
episodes.overview: Denby and Frobisher kidnap Willow but dismay at her inability to sin. Patricia plans to captures KT by offering to help clear her name. Jerome and Joy share a kiss - Mara's plan is backfiring?

episodes.name: House of Cunning
episodes.overview: KT's hopes of proving her innocence disappear when Harriet is sectioned. The Sibunas search for the artefacts with the help of a family rhyme when the phonograph is mysteriously restored. Eddie faces the real Sibuna traitor.

episodes.name: House of Suspicion
episodes.overview: Willow discovers she's related to Joy and saves the day when she inadvertently provides the clue to a missing artefact. KT decides to run away, leaving Victor without his precious sinner. Fabian learns the truth about Patricia.

episodes.name: House of Capture
episodes.overview: When Fabian's trusting nature lands him in the hands of Frobisher, Ammut's collection is almost complete. Meanwhile, Eddie realises the Sibuna traitor is not KT and Jerome shocks Joy with a surprise ending to their play.

episodes.name: House of Heartbreak
episodes.overview: Mara is furious as a heartbroken Joy admits her feelings for Jerome. Eddie calls on Patricia's sister for help with the missing artefact clue and KT is torn as she realises she doesn't know who to trust.

episodes.name: House of Hog
episodes.overview: Alfie convinces KT that he's not a sinner. They rescue Eddie from Team Evil's clutches – only for Alfie himself to be captured. Joy and Mara are forced to work together when they lose Willow's cherished pet hedgehog.

episodes.name: House of Defeat
episodes.overview: Eddie and KT find the final artefact and take it to the gatehouse to destroy Ammut – only to realise they have been tricked. An evil Alfie breaks Willow's heart and Joy and Mara bond while coming to her aid.

episodes.name: House of Ammut
episodes.overview: As Ammut begins to form, Frobisher demands KT's key – but where is it? Eddie and KT find it on Willow, and realise the purpose of the keys. Jerome explains his feelings to Joy in a letter. But Joy won't read it.

episodes.name: House of Heroes
episodes.overview: Harriet sacrifices herself as Eddie and KT finally unlock the portal to destroy Ammut and save them all. KT says an emotional goodbye to Frobisher. Joy and Jerome have Mara's blessing, and Alfie has a special gift for Willow.
